description: MySQL persist client generation - append to existing connections.bal with existing client
name: userdb

sample-project-with-connections/Ballerin.newText:
[[tool.persist]]
id = "sample_project_with_connections.departments"
targetModule = "sample_project_with_connections.departments"
filePath = "persist/model.bal"
options.datastore = "mysql"
options.eagerLoading = true
options.withInitParams = true

[[dependency]]
org = "ballerina"
name = "tool.persist"
version = "1.8.0"
